info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 7:38PM CDT until August 16 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Wisconsin, including the following county, Grant.
* WHEN...Until 1100 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1/2 to 1 1/2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cuba City, Hazel Green, Dickeyville, Cassville, Georgetown, Beetown, Potosi, Glen Haven, Tennyson, Rockville, Burton, Cornelia, Kieler, Big H Campground, Sandy Hook, Louisburg, Sinsinawa and Platteville Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING
